contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|FTL}} '''FTL''' may stand for: == Places == * [[Fort Lauderdale, Florida]] == Games == * [[FTL: Faster Than Light]], a simulation game by Subset Games * [[Faster Than Light (software publisher)]], a British video games company * [[FTL Games]], the video game development division of Software Heaven Inc == Science and technology == * [[Faster-than-light]], a speculative concept in physics and science fiction ** [[FTL Drive]] or Jump drive * [[Ferritin light chain]], a human gene that encodes the light subunit of the ferritin protein * [[Flash_file_system#Translation_layers|Flash Translation Layer]], a software layer used in computing to support normal file systems with flash memory * [[FreeMarker]] Template Language, a Java-based template engine for generating HTML web pages, particularly in servlet-based applications using MVC == Other == * Flight and duty Time Limitations, necessary to ensure that pilot fatigue does not endanger flight safety: See [[Fatigue (safety)]] * [[Foot-lambert]], a measure of luminance * [[Free Talk Live]], a libertarian talk-show * [[Fruit of the Loom]], NYSE code, an American clothing manufacturer * Full Truckload, a standard logistics/transportation term: See [[Less than truckload]] * [[Fluorescent lamp|Fluorescent Tube Lamp]], a type of fluorescent lamp {{disambiguation}}
